hideContentOnMobile.description: Required for some designs (link in the overview page)

activeOnly.description: Enable if only active item should show on mobile

hideMeta.description: Use this if you don't want to show the meta bar with date, tags and reading time

date.description: Set this field if the post was actually created at a different time then right now (ex. in another system)

body.default_value: When you make your first order it already works as a one week’s trial. You can cancel, skip or pause the next subscription any time before the next delivery (latest on Wednesday 10AM). No penalty fees.

quantityEnabled.description: If the product can change quantity or not (eg. mealplan cannot change amount)

actions.description: note: needs to be valid JSON

props.description:
Pass in props directly, to showcase different cases that are normally not controllable from the CMS.
NOTE: must be a valid JSON object or array (if multiple items in content)

content.default_value: When you make your first order it already works as a one week’s trial. You can cancel, skip or pause the next subscription any time before the next delivery (latest on Wednesday 10AM). No penalty fees.

signupCampaign.description: The id of the group the user should be added to when signing up

badges.description: Company trust badges, like b-corp, organic, eco, etc.

pattern.description:
Custom regex pattern to validate against:
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#attr-pattern

id.description: Used to create an anchor on the section, so we can direct link to that part of the page.

subPath.description: The specific sub folder path to get items from

showMeals.description: 2 for desktop, and 3rd for mobile only

weekDifference.description:
A number of weeks into the future (or past) to show the menu for.
The default of 0 will show the upcoming sunday's menu.

minimumEssentialsText.description: The text warning shown when the minimum essentials amount has not been reached

continueShoppingButton.description: The button that is shown if the user has not reached the minimum amount

title.description:
(optional)
Used for the top bar in mobile, to give the modal an overall purpose/description

hideDiscountForm.description: Other discount info is needed for now.

info.description: Very relevant price information, like "pr person" etc.

lightbox.description: If detail should open in a lightbox

addLabel.description: The text on the Add-to-cart button.

productsLink.description:
The root url of where the products live, ex.
https://simplefeast.com/dk/essentials

energyLabel.description: The text to accompany the product cards' calories/kilojoule info.

discountMessage.description:
Note: using bold in this text will bump the size and change it to blue.
Use this to highlight discount code.

productsLink.description: Point this to the existing products (essentials) url

products.default_value:
The products to upsell
Note: the order when you select items determines the order they show up in the list

detailsLabel.description: The little "details" label on each product

text.default_value: The flavors are SERIOUSLY incredible. Like I ordered from a gourmet vegan restaurant!

confirmOrderModal.description:
A modal view used when the user needs to confirm an order.
Especially useful in account

redirectPath.description: Where to redirect if the user shouldn't be able to choose meals here

detailsLabel.description: This text is used when a meal cannot be selected, and instead should just show the details overlay when clicking the button

show_line.description: Enable or disable showing a horizontal line

theme.description: Which trustpilot theme, aligns with the background color, so if using a dark background, use "dark" theme.

region.description: (optional, only use to override the auto detected region from the url)

title.description: The title used to display in the top bar on mobile, and for a11y on desktop
